subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Rutgers president, Robert L. Barchi, said that Julie Hermann’s job was not in jeopardy after allegations that she verbally abused players when she was the volleyball coach at Tennessee in the late 1990s.
snippet: The Rutgers president, Robert L. Barchi, said that Julie Hermann’s job was not in jeopardy after allegations that she verbally abused players when she was the volleyball coach at Tennessee in the late 1990s.
